select detail.id detailId, detail.parent_id parentId,
detail.count detailCount,
round(ifnull(signDetail.arrive_count, 0), 2) signCount,
round(ifnull(retreatDetail.count, 0), 2) retreatCount,
round((ifnull(signDetail.arrive_count, 0) - ifnull(retreatDetail.count, 0)), 2) arriveCount
from vmes_purchase_order_detail detail
left join ( select order_detail_id, sum(arrive_count) arrive_count from vmes_purchase_sign_detail where isdisable = '1' group by order_detail_id ) signDetail on detail.id = signDetail.order_detail_id
left join ( select order_detail_id, sum(count) count from vmes_purchase_retreat_detail where state = '3' group by order_detail_id ) retreatDetail on detail.id = retreatDetail.order_detail_id
and detail.parent_id = #{parentId}
order by ${orderStr}
